title: Intentions for the Week
description: Intentions for the Week- Week 25 in 2025 Hi hiiiiii! Welcome to week 25! How was your weekend? excerpt: Intentions for the Week is a weekly TO DO list series on Shutterbean.com, created by Tracy Benjamin of The Handwriting Club. What started as a personal planning ritual turned into a structured planner designed to help you organize your week with intention, creativity, and accountability. Follow along every Monday for inspiration, productivity tips, and a space to map out your goals!

Intentions for the Week- Week 25 in 2025

Hi hiiiiii! Welcome to week 25!Â  How was your weekend?Â  We had friends over, I caught up on chores, cleaned my car (long overdue) and we celebrated Casey yesterday. I am so thankful my child has such a good dad!Â 

Did you have any time to yourself?Â  (I had a few hours)

Did you get to rest? (We rested yesterday!)Â 

Did you do meal prep?Â  (I cleaned out fridge)

Do you know whatâ€™s for dinner tonight?

Need to check in with yourself and regroup to finish the second half of 2025 with intention? Come to my workshop Saturday, 06/28.Â  Weâ€™ll check in together. Iâ€™ll show you all of my tracking tools (including my Time Management system and my Meal Planning Pack!)Â
